First Steward0642288d5ytclrlk2kebqc2kife3cw0yozwg253072012-03-26T12:29:08ZOpark 77210608StartThe '''First Steward''' is a position in the [[Night's Watch]], the group responsible for defending [[the Wall]] . The holder is the leader of the stewards, only answering to the [[Lord Commander]].

The current First Steward is [[Bowen Marsh]].
